item.title: Connecting Vim With Golang
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: An introduction to Vim and how to use Vim with Golang Vim is a powerful text-editor, usually used server environments with no graphical interfaces. In this post, I will layer a basic foundation of Vim and show you how to use Vim as an IDE for Go. What is Vim Vim is a highly configurable text editor built to enable efficient text editing, the next version of Vi (Vim = Vi Improved), written by Bram Moolenaar, first released in 1991.
